name: skybear (Lane A. LeRoy)
description:
Title: SkyBear

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers Gamers 

Overview: while playing this game you are a bear stuck in an unusual environment. the goal is to see who can play the longest and get past the most platforms.  

Instructions: W,A,S,D control your movement while r makes you response. Space is your jump key. 

Game Design Team: Lane LeRoy – Game Designer
